data.name: Bellsprout_Line_001
data.value: Shroomish and I got to this camp no problem,[pause=0] but the dungeon ahead is another story.

data.name: Bellsprout_Line_002
data.value: The Flying-type Pokémon there just ruin us.

data.name: Bellsprout_Line_003
data.value: Shouldn't we ask an Electric Pokémon for help?

data.name: Doduo_Intro_001
data.value: Oh,[pause=20] are you new here?

data.name: Doduo_Intro_002
data.value: I'm Doduo,

data.name: Doduo_Intro_003
data.value: and this is Pachirisu. She and I make up our team, Tactical Retreat.

data.name: Doduo_Intro_004
data.value: Good luck trying to do whatever it is that you're doing,[pause=20] I guess...

data.name: Doduo_Line_001
data.value: In case you couldn't tell,[pause=20] our specialty is running.[pause=0] For better or for worse.

data.name: Doduo_Line_002
data.value: A lot of teams get stuck in this camp specifically,[pause=30] ourselves included.

data.name: Doduo_Line_003
data.value: Actual combat skill is needed as the dungeons get tougher.

data.name: Doduo_Line_004
data.value: Pachirisu thinks we can get by if we hone our running skills...[pause=30] but...[pause=30] uh...

data.name: Doduo_Line_005
data.value: We've been stuck here for a while...

data.name: Monk_Line_001
data.value: Explorers on this island have many reasons for ascending this mountain range.[pause=0] What are yours?

data.name: Monk_Line_002
data.value: May you find what you seek here.

data.name: Monk_Line_Curiosity
data.value: But of course.[br]As the last unexplored region in the world,[pause=0] it is only natural for you to be drawn here.[br]Some may fear the unknown,[pause=0] but you are among those that are drawn to it.

data.name: Monk_Line_Fame
data.value: I see...[pause=0] so you have been lured by the rumors of the Guildmaster's promise.[br]That any team that reaches the top shall be named their successor.

data.name: Monk_Line_Fortune
data.value: The hidden treasures of the legendary exploration team![br]I too have heard the rumors of how they locked their fortunes deep within this island.

data.name: Monk_Line_Strength
data.value: Ah,[pause=0] our goals are one and the same.[br]Absent any desire for material gains,[pause=0] I am merely here to hone my body and mind.

data.name: Monk_Line_Unknown
data.value: Indecisive?[pause=0] Perhaps you will find a purpose nonetheless.[br]Experiencing the Mystery Dungeons can reveal things about yourself that you may not even know.

data.name: Monk_Option_Curiosity
data.value: Adventure

data.name: Monk_Option_Fame
data.value: Fame

data.name: Monk_Option_Fortune
data.value: Fortune

data.name: Monk_Option_Strength
data.value: Strength

data.name: Monk_Option_Unknown
data.value: Don't know...

data.name: Pachirisu_Intro_001
data.value: Hiya![pause=0] Great to see new people around![pause=30] The name's Pachirisu.

data.name: Pachirisu_Intro_002
data.value: Over here is my partner, Doduo. We're Team Tactical Retreat!

data.name: Pachirisu_Intro_003
data.value: Our team name reflects our talents![pause=0] I know it sounds funny,

data.name: Pachirisu_Intro_004
data.value: but learning when to run is important for exploring.

data.name: Pachirisu_Line_001
data.value: Our main skill is being able to outrun our opponents!

data.name: Pachirisu_Line_002
data.value: Doduo and I even got to around ten or so floors into the Guildmaster Trail!

data.name: Pachirisu_Line_003
data.value: A lot of explorers don't manage to get that far in there.

data.name: Pachirisu_Line_004
data.value: I'm sure if we keep working at it,[pause=20] we'll get to the top someday!

data.name: Rival_Line_001
data.value: Hiss... The road ahead is difficult.[pause=0] Fellow traveler, take thissss...

data.name: Rival_Line_002
data.value: If you find yourself in a ssssticky situation, do not hesitate to esssscape.

data.name: Rival_Line_003
data.value: I musssst push forward.[pause=0] There is a rival I need to surpasssss...

data.name: Shroomish_Line_001
data.value: Come on,[pause=20] one more try![pause=0] We can do it with just the two of us!

data.name: Sightseer_Line_001
data.value: Lovely breeze here, isn't it?[br]This cliff would be a nice place to make a nest, if I do say so myself.[br]If only it wasn't surrounded by Mystery Dungeons...

data.name: Storehouse_Line_001
data.value: Confound it![pause=0] Where are those two slackers?[br]Ekans and Gligar were supposed to be here with the supplies a long time ago!

data.name: Undergrowth_Intro_001
data.value: We're Team Undergrowth.[pause=0] Pleased to meet you.
